name: Cayman Islands
scope_notes: Prototype compliance mapping only. Always confirm Cayman vehicle requirements and ongoing obligations with Cayman counsel and the regulator.
marketing_notes: Distribution depends on investor type and jurisdiction of marketing.
Counsel review required for cross-border offering materials.
licensing_notes: Check requirements for manager/adviser location and activities.
tokenization_notes: Tokenization requires separate securities/offering and transfer analysis.
crypto_financing_notes: Crypto exposure may add AML, custody, and disclosure obligations.
